info.title: HMPPS Incentives API
info.description: API for viewing and managing incentive levels and reviews for prisoners

tags.name: Incentive review summary
tags.description: List of incentive review information for a given location within a prison and on a given level

tags.name: Incentive levels
tags.description: Incentive levels and their global associated information

tags.name: Maintain incentive reviews
tags.description: Retrieve and add incentive review records. Requires INCENTIVE_REVIEWS role and read scope

tags.name: Prison incentive levels
tags.description: Incentive levels and their per-prison associated information

put.summary: Reset all incentive levels for a prison
put.description:
Activates the required set of levels, ensuring that Standard is the default level for admission. This can be used when a new prison is opened. Any levels that are already active will remain active and associated information remains unchanged. Returns all incentive levels in this prison including those that were already active. 

Requires role: MAINTAIN_PRISON_IEP_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain events: "incentives.prison-level.changed"

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

get.summary: Returns an incentive level in this prison along with associated information
get.description: Note that it may be inactive in the prison. For the majority of use cases, inactive levels in a prison should be ignored.

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

put.description:
Payload must include all required fields. Deactivating a level is only possible if there are no prisoners currently on it.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_PRISON_IEP_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.prison-level.changed"

400.description: Invalid payload or level is being deactivated despite having prisoners on it

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

delete.summary: Deactivate an incentive level for a prison
delete.description:
Deactivating a level is only possible if there are no prisoners currently on it.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_PRISON_IEP_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.prison-level.changed"

400.description: Incentive level is globally required or there are prisoners on this incentive level at this prison

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

patch.description:
Partial updates are allowed. Deactivating a level is only possible if there are no prisoners currently on it.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_PRISON_IEP_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.prison-level.changed"

400.description: Invalid payload or level is being deactivated despite having prisoners on it

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

get.summary: Returns an incentive level by code
get.description: Note that it may be inactive. For the majority of use cases, inactive levels in a prison should be ignored.

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

404.description: Incentive level with this code not found

put.description:
Payload must include all required fields. A level marked as required must also be active. Deactivating a level is only possible if it is not active in any prison (moreInfo field will contain comma-separated prison ids). Deactivated incentive levels remain in the same position with respect to the others.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_INCENTIVE_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.level.changed"

400.description: Invalid payload or level is being deactivated despite being active in some prison

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

delete.description:
A required level cannot be deactivated, needs to be updated first to be not required. Deactivating a level is only possible if it is not active in any prison (moreInfo field will contain comma-separated prison ids). Deactivated incentive levels remain in the same position with respect to the others.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_INCENTIVE_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.level.changed"

400.description: Incentive level is marked as required or is active in some prison

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

patch.description:
Partial updates are allowed. A level marked as required must also be active. Deactivating a level is only possible if it is not active in any prison (moreInfo field will contain comma-separated prison ids). Deactivated incentive levels remain in the same position with respect to the others.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_INCENTIVE_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.level.changed"

400.description: Invalid payload or level is being deactivated despite being active in some prison

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

get.summary: Lists all incentive levels, optionally including inactive ones
get.description: For the majority of use cases, inactive levels in a prison should be ignored.

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

post.description:
New incentive levels are added to the end of the list.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_INCENTIVE_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.level.changed"

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

get.summary: Returns a history of incentive reviews for a prisoner, Requires INCENTIVE_REVIEWS role and read scope
get.description: Prisoner Number is an unique reference for a prisoner in NOMIS

400.description: Incorrect data specified to return incentive history

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

post.summary: Adds a new Incentive Review for this specific prisoner by prisoner number
post.description: Prisoner Number is an unique reference for a prisoner in NOMIS, requires INCENTIVE_REVIEWS role and write scope

400.description: Incorrect data specified to add new incentive review

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

patch.summary: Sets the order of incentive levels
patch.description:
All existing incentive level codes must be provided.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_INCENTIVE_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain event: "incentives.levels.reordered"

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

404.description: Incentive level with this code not found

get.summary: Provides content for a prisoner to satisfy the needs of a subject access request on their behalf
get.description: Requires role SAR_DATA_ACCESS or additional role as specified by hmpps.sar.additionalAccessRole configuration.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Optional parameter denoting minimum date of event occurrence which should be returned in the response

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Optional parameter denoting maximum date of event occurrence which should be returned in the response

204.description: Request successfully processed - no content found

209.description: Subject Identifier is not recognised by this service

401.description: The client does not have authorisation to make this request

403.description: Forbidden, requires an appropriate role

get.summary: List of incentive review information for a given location within a prison and on a given level
get.description: Location should be a cell ID prefix like `MDI-1`

403.description: Request does not have necessary permissions

get.summary: Lists incentive levels in this prison along with associated information, optionally including inactive ones
get.description: Inactive incentive levels in the prison were previously active at some point. Not all global inactive incentive levels are necessarily included. For the majority of use cases, inactive levels in a prison should be ignored.

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

delete.summary: Deactivate all incentive levels for a prison
delete.description:
This can be used when a prison closes. Returns all incentive levels in this prison including those that were already inactive. Deactivating a level is only possible if there are no prisoners currently on it.

Requires role: MAINTAIN_PRISON_IEP_LEVELS with write scope

Raises HMPPS domain events: "incentives.prison-level.changed"

400.description: There are prisoners on some incentive level at this prison

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

get.summary: Returns a specified Incentive Review, Requires INCENTIVE_REVIEWS role and read scope

400.description: Incorrect data specified to return incentive review level history

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

get.summary: Returns a history of incentive reviews for a prisoner, Requires INCENTIVE_REVIEWS role and read scope
get.description: Booking ID is an internal ID for a prisoner in NOMIS

parameters.name: with-details
parameters.description: Toggle to return incentive reviews detail entries in response (or not)

schema.description: Toggle to return incentive reviews detail entries in response (or not)

200.description: Incentive review Level history information returned

400.description: Incorrect data specified to return incentive review level history

403.description: Incorrect permissions to use this endpoint

errorCode.description: When present, uniquely identifies the type of error making it easier for clients to discriminate without relying on error description; see `uk.gov.justice.digital.hmpps.incentivesapi.config.ErrorResponse` enumeration in hmpps-incentives-api

userMessage.example: No incentive level found for code `ABC`

levelCode.description: The incentive level code this refers to

active.description: Indicates that this incentive level is enabled in this prison (true if not supplied)

defaultOnAdmission.description: Indicates that this incentive level is the default for new admissions (false if not supplied)

remandTransferLimitInPence.description: The amount transferred weekly from the private cash account to the spends account for a remand prisoner to use

remandSpendLimitInPence.description: The maximum amount allowed in the spends account for a remand prisoner

convictedTransferLimitInPence.description: The amount transferred weekly from the private cash account to the spends account for a convicted prisoner to use

convictedSpendLimitInPence.description: The maximum amount allowed in the spends account for a convicted prisoner

visitOrders.description: The number of weekday visits for a convicted prisoner per fortnight

privilegedVisitOrders.description: The number of privileged/weekend visits for a convicted prisoner per 4 weeks

code.description: Unique id for the incentive level

active.description: Indicates that the incentive level is active (true if not supplied); inactive levels are historic levels no longer in use

required.description: Indicates that all prisons must have this level active (false if not supplied)

CreateIncentiveReviewRequest.description: Request to add a new incentive review

reviewTime.description: Date and time of the review, if not provided will default to now

reviewedBy.description: The username of the member of staff undertaking the review, if not provided will use the user in the JWT access token

id.description: Unique ID for this review (new Incentives data model only)

iepDate.description: Date when last review took place

iepTime.description: Date and time when last review took place

locationId.description: DEPRECATED - Location of prisoner at the time when review was created in Incentives service (i.e. their cell)

auditModuleName.description: Internal audit field holding which system/screen recorded the review

active.description: Indicates that this incentive level is enabled in this prison

defaultOnAdmission.description: Indicates that this incentive level is the default for new admissions

remandTransferLimitInPence.description: The amount transferred weekly from the private cash account to the spends account for a remand prisoner to use

remandSpendLimitInPence.description: The maximum amount allowed in the spends account for a remand prisoner

convictedTransferLimitInPence.description: The amount transferred weekly from the private cash account to the spends account for a convicted prisoner to use

convictedSpendLimitInPence.description: The maximum amount allowed in the spends account for a convicted prisoner

visitOrders.description: The number of weekday visits for a convicted prisoner per fortnight

privilegedVisitOrders.description: The number of privileged/weekend visits for a convicted prisoner per 4 weeks

active.description: Indicates that the incentive level is active; inactive levels are historic levels no longer in use

required.description: Indicates that all prisons must have this level active

attachmentNumber.description: The number of the attachment which will match any corresponding reference in the content section

name.description: The name or description of the attachment which will be included in the report

contentType.description: The content type of the attachment

url.description: The url to be used to download the attachment file

filesize.description: The size of the attachment file in bytes

content.description: The content of the subject access request response

attachments.description: The details of any attachments for the subject access request response

IncentiveReview.description: Incentive review information for a prisoner

bookingId.description: Internal reference for a period in prison

positiveBehaviours.description: Count of all the positive case note behaviour entries recorded in the last 3 months

negativeBehaviours.description: Count of all the negative case note behaviour entries recorded in the last 3 months

hasAcctOpen.description: Whether the prisoner has an ACCT open alert

isNewToPrison.description: Whether the prisoner is new to prison, i.e. has never had an incentive review in person

daysSinceLastReview.description: Days since last review, null when no real review has taken place

IncentiveReviewLevel.description: An Incentive level available at the given location, with the total and overdue number of prisoners at this level

reviewCount.description: Number of prisoners at this level

overdueCount.description: Number of overdue prisoners at this level

IncentiveReviewResponse.description: Incentive reviews list for prisoners at a given location

levels.description: List of levels available at the given location, with the total and overdue number of prisoners at each level

id.description: Unique ID for this review (new Incentives data model only)

iepDate.description: Date when last review took place

iepTime.description: Date and time when last review took place

locationId.description: DEPRECATED - Location of prisoner at the time when review was created in Incentives service (i.e. their cell)
